assets.description: Directed by Mark Szumski, this charming spot was fully concepted at Click3x.  Working with our partners at LEGO, we handled all aspects of design, production, and post to create a live action/CGI hybrid that is out of this world.
assets.title: LEGO Build Together

assets.description: We helped conceptualize, co-direct and execute this teaser for legendary hip-hop artist EL-P's new album "Cancer for the Cure." The spot was directed by Click 3X's Mark Szumski and Timothy Saccenti, of Radical Media. Drone character design and vfx composites for the music video and teaser were done by Szumski with photo-real CGI work handled by our CGI team.
assets.title: Drone Teaser

assets.description: We designed and animated over a minute of 3D CGI superhero madness for a several broadcast commercials and an online series.
assets.title: Bonkazonks

assets.description: We created an entirely CG world for the CG Monopoly dog in this Maryland Lottery spot. He dances around, taking his chances at scratching the lotto ticket.  The environment was a combination of CG foreground elements and HDRI backplates.
assets.title: Maryland Lotto Monopoly

assets.description: Directed by Mark Szumski, we shot live action footage of the talent on our own stage and then combined it with CG graphics elements in Flame.
assets.title: Rattlerz

assets.description: We filmed a hand holding a business card and combined that with Maya generated CG characters in Flame.
assets.title: Fedex Office

assets.description: We created the CG characters in Maya and composited them using sparks in Flame.
assets.title: Furry Frenzies

assets.description: We shot the live action footage on location and composited it with Real Flow generated CG liquid combined in Flame.
assets.title: Ford F150

assets.description: We created CG elements in Maya and composited them with live action shots of liquid and combined them in Flame.
assets.title: Dunkin Donuts Mirrors
